section.title: Controlled vocabularies module
section.para: This module changes the definition of several attributes in several objects (such as partOfSpeech.value, inflectedForm.indicator, label.value) from free open string (= can take any text) to a reference to a controlled vocabulary.
This module adds features to the lexicographicResource data type for specifying what those controlled vocabularies, either by listing them explicitely or by referring to external authority.

The module makes it possible to model complex contraints on the values that the various attributes can take. For example, the partOfSpeech.value attribute takes different values depending on whether its parent is entry or headwordTranslation, and if headwordTranslation, depending on what the headwordTranslation's language is.
